node.description: A platform where users can view and track the information of World's Top Cryptocurrencies.

node.name: PHONE-DIRECTORY-MANAGEMENT-SYSTEM

node.name: CHAT-APP
node.description: A platform where users can register and login and chat with their friends. Users can either chat 1 on 1 or can create a group chat as well.

node.name: WEATHER-APP-2
node.description: An application which lets you know the weather details of any city entered by the user. All basic details are shown in the app including temperature, humidity, clouds etc.

node.name: TASKS-TRACKER
node.description: A CRUD Application where users can create update and delete the tasks they add to the list. A handy application to keep all the things you want to do in one place.
